START1.name: the front of a large building
START1.desc: There is a mysterious man out front handing out flyers and you decide to take one [Enter 'read flier' to see what is written on it.]
START1.up: Upon closer inspection, the building appears to be five stories tall but has no windows and a neon sign above with the text 'Ramos's Mansion'.

START2.name: the front of a large building
START2.desc: The man handing out flyers is gone.
START2.up: Upon closer inspection, the building appears to be five stories tall but has no windows and a neon sign above with the text 'Ramos's Mansion'.

F1V1.name: First Floor
F1V1.desc: You enter to see a long hallway.

items.desc: The walls are draped with curtains.
items.inspect: You find a cord to pull one of the curtains up.

items.desc: At the other end you see a lone bookshelf
items.inspect: You can see light comming from under the bookshelf

F1V2.name: First Floor
F1V2.desc: You enter to see a long hallway.

items.desc: The walls are draped with curtains.
items.inspect: You find a cord to pull one of the curtains up.

items.desc: At the other end there is an elevator
items.inspect: You already moved the bookshelf.

F1V6.name: First Floor
F1V6.desc: The safe opens and there is a blue gem inside, grab the gem so you can continue.

items.desc: The gem has a soft blue glow to it.
items.inspect: You can't tell what kind of gem it is.

items.desc: You're not sure if Acetate is even a real word but hey you got the password right.
items.inspect: The safe is open, the animatronic has stoped talking.

F1V7.name: First Floor
F1V7.desc: You are in a long hallway..

items.desc: At the other end there is an elevator
items.inspect: You already moved the bookshelf

items.desc: The safe is open and you got what you needed
items.inspect: It's empty on the inside, like you.

F1PW1.name: First Floor
F1PW1.desc: 'What's the password' you hear coming from the safe skull on the safe.

items.desc: At the other end you see a lone bookshelf
items.inspect: You can see light comming from under the bookshelf

items.desc: It won't shut up unless you leave or answer the question [Hint: just type the password no extra text is needed]
items.inspect: At first you're shocked but upon closer look, it's clearly an animatronic. 'What's the password' it repeats.

F2V1.name: Secound Floor
F2V1.desc: You're in a pure white room. It feels so cold and empty, it sends a chill down your spin
F2V1.up: For some reason, the ceiling looks like the night sky.

items.desc: The only thing in the room is a metal staute of a dragon
items.inspect: You find 'In dedication to the founder'carved into the base of the staute.

F3V1.name: Third Floor
F3V1.desc: The room is small and dusty.
F3V1.up: You see cobwebs full of flies in each of the room's corners. Seems like the spiders won't be going hungry for awhile

F3V4.name: Third Floor
F3V4.desc: You brush aside the dust and see writing on one of the walls: '1=a, 2=t, 3=t, 4=c, 5=e' .
F3V4.up: You see cobwebs full of flies in each of the room's corners. Seems like the spiders won't be going hungry for awhile

F4V1.name: Fourth Floor
F4V1.desc: You enter a strange room where the only thing that seems to be in it is a ceiling fan attached to floor
F4V1.up: You look up and find a bed attched to the ceiling, along with a table, and some chairs.

items.desc: If it's on the floor can you still call it a ceiling fan, or is it a floor fan?
items.inspect: Under one of the blades of the fan you see a symbol that looks like an arrow turning.

F4V2.name: Fourth Floor
F4V2.desc: You're in a mostly empty room.
F4V2.up: You look up and find a bed attched to the ceiling, along with a table, and some chairs.

items.desc: One of the pillows fall from the bed on the ceiling and land on the floor.
items.inspect: It is a blue pillow, there doesn't seem to be anything strange about it.
items.take: You take the blue pillow with you.

F4V3.name: Fourth Floor
F4V3.desc: You're in a mostly empty room.
F4V3.up: You look up and find a bed attched to the ceiling, along with a table, and some chairs.

items.desc: The ceiling fan is still on the floor.
items.inspect: The fan's blade seems stuck in place now.

F5V1.name: Fifth Flooth
F5V1.desc: You enter what apears to be a normal bed room. There is bed, a small cupboard, a TV mounted on the wall, and a door that looks to lead into a closet
F5V1.up: There is just a regular ceiling fan.

items.desc: There is a bed
items.inspect: It is a king size bed with on one red pillow and a purple bed sheet

items.desc: a cupboard
items.inspect: You open up the cupboard, there is nothing inside.

items.desc: a TV mounted on the wall
items.inspect: You turn the TV to find it playing reality televison. Since you can't find a means to change the channel, you turn off rather then subject yourself to that.

items.desc: and a door that looks to lead into a closet
items.inspect: The door is locked, you need a key to open it.

items.desc: There is now a dust feather where the bed once was
items.inspect: You wonder if this is really it.

items.desc: a cupboard

items.desc: a cupboard

items.desc: a TV mounted on the wall
items.inspect: You turn the TV to find it playing reality televison. Since you can't find a means to change the channel, you turn off rather then subject yourself to that.

items.desc: and a door you to a closet
items.inspect: You already opened the closet door.

items.desc: You open the closet and find a lever
items.inspect: It's the only thing in the closet.
items.Pull: You pull the lever and the whole building starts shaking

F5V9.name: Fifth Flooth
F5V9.up: There is just a regular ceiling fan.

items.desc: a cupboard
items.inspect: You open up the cupboard, there is nothing inside.

items.desc: a TV mounted on the wall
items.inspect: You turn the TV to find it playing reality televison. Since you can't find a means to change the channel, you turn off rather then subject yourself to that.

items.desc: and a door you to a closet
items.inspect: You already opened the closet door.

items.desc: in the closet is a giant lever
items.inspect: It's the only thing in the closet.

F6V1.name: Final Floor
F6V1.desc: You did it, you reached the final floor

items.desc: You see a clip-on button set on a pedestal
items.take: You take the button and put it on. Despite not paying money you still feel ripped off.
items.inspect: The button has 'I beat Ramos's Mansion' written on it

ELVTV1.name: Elevator
ELVTV1.desc: The elevator has buttons for floors 1 through 5, there is a hole where the sixth button should be.

ELVTV2.name: Elevator
ELVTV2.desc: The elevator has buttons for floors 1 through 5, there is a hole where the sixth button should be.

ELVTV8.name: Elevator
ELVTV8.desc: The elevator has buttons for floors 1 through 5, and the sixth button is now there somehow.

QUESTION1.name: Secound Floor
QUESTION1.desc: A cage falls on top of you, preventing you from leaving. However, before you have time to think about it, the dragon stands up and starts speaking
QUESTION1.up: For some reason the ceiling looks like the night sky.

items.desc: Dragon: You've done well so far but now you must answer my questions correctly if you hope to leave
items.inspect: You see 'In dedication to the founder'carved into the base of the staute.

items.desc: Dragon: First, what was the number of the room that was upside down?
items.inspect: Thing have gone from 0 to 100, you're not sure what to do aside from answer the question.

QUESTION2.name: Secound Floor
QUESTION2.desc: Dragon: That was a warm up.
QUESTION2.up: For some reason the ceiling looks like the night sky.

items.desc: Dragon: Next Question what floor will you have to go to, after this one, before you can go to the sixth floor
items.inspect: You see 'In dedication to the founder'carved into the base of the staute.
Thing have gone from 0 to 100, you're not sure what to do aside from answer the question.

QUESTION3.name: Secound Floor
QUESTION3.up: For some reason the ceiling looks like the night sky.

items.desc: Dragon: Final question, What's my name
items.inspect: You see 'In dedication to the founder'carved into the base of the staute.
You're tyring to think if you were ever told his name or any name for that matter..

CHEAT.name: Cheaters Dungeon
CHEAT.desc: You shouldn't be able to know the password yet, so that mean you're now trapped here for cheating. There is no escape

KEY.name: Secound Floor
KEY.desc: You after you answered the question the dragon just smiled and vainshed
KEY.up: For some reason the ceiling looks like the night sky.

items.desc: The cage is lifted and there is now a key on the floor, it's probably a good idea to take the key before leaving.
items.inspect: The key is where the dragon once was. You still wonder what exactly was that thing.
